question: In which one of the following nations "Azokh Cave", a habitation site of prehistoric humans, is located?
explanation: Azokh Caves is located in Azerbaijan. It is one of the most ancient locations of proto-human presence in Eurasia. The terminology "Azykh Man" is associated with this site. In 1968, a Neanderthal-like jaw bone, which is said to be over 300,000 years old, was found in this site. It is one of the oldest proto-human remains found in Central Asia.
